entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IFormFile incompatible with FromForm in Minimal APIs for .NET 8 Preview 6 #49526
    8.0-rc1
  • DPAPI and Antiforgery failture in Razor Pages #49525
  • .net 8 publish failed with error "An item with the same key has already been added" #49523
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, json #49522
  • Update API docs for OnAfterRender to clarify it is only invoked after an interactive render and isn't called during prerendering #49518
  • FolderBrowserDialog crashes WPF Blazor Hybrid apps #49516
    8.0-rc2
  • AuthorizeRouteView doesn't play well with Router in Server-side rendered Blazor app #49515
    8.0-rc1
  • Use of proprietary license in AspNetCoreModule-Setup #49512
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.7.23364.32] Fail to launch BootstrapBlazor page with System.InvalidOperationException #49511
  • Perf regression: fortunes #49510
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #49509

Closed

  • RequestSizeLimit throws an error #49461
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #49459
  • Perf regression: mapaction, plaintext, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #49495
  • Add ``OnMounted`` component lifecycle event #49497
  • Blazor Web App server prerender never sends response when component contains large `string` #49505
  • Object does not have a property matching the name '@rendermode' #49167
    8.0-preview7
  • Blazor forms model binding #48759
    8.0-preview7
  • [Blazor] Have a way to configure dotnet runtime for blazor apps #49264
    8.0-rc1
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef, mapaction #49419
  • Perf regression: mvc #49473
  • Perf regression: json, json, plaintext #49479
  • Having parity between IParsable support in RDF and RDG #47134
    8.0-preview6
  • Updating HttpContext.Request.Path inside middleware has no effect in selecting the endpoint for the request #49454
  • IDX10720: Unable to create KeyedHashAlgorithm for algorithm 'HS512', the key size must be greater than: '512' bits, key has '256' bits. Arg_ParamName_Name #49455

PullRequests

Created

  • Update BuildErrors.md #49527
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Wilson7 branch #49524
    area-security
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2225374 #49521
    area-mvc
  • Clarify API docs for OnAfterRender #49519
    area-blazor
  • Reduce allocations in AuthorizationPolicyBuilder.Combine #49517
    Perf, area-security

Merged

  • Upload manifest.json #49528
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Microsoft.Identity.Web to latest 2.13 #49467
    area-infrastructure, area-grpc, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Public API for interacting with runtime #49420
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 8.0-rc1
  • Update branding to rc1 #49506
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • Add support for anti-forgery middleware #49233
    area-middleware
  • [Blazor] Improvements to the interaction between SSR and interactive rendering #49238
    area-blazor
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.7.23364.32 #49470
    area-infrastructure
  • Redis distributed/output cache: include scenario in connection metadata #49291
    area-runtime, feature-output-caching
  • Improve performance of output cache #48328
    feature-middleware, area-perf, feature-output-caching, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Improve HttpContextAccessor debugging #49430
    area-runtime
  • Add more MapIdentityApi endpoints #49498
    area-identity
  • Improve MVC and RazorPages debugging #49353
    area-mvc
